column4: the wlain on my dell inspiron 1545 is not working it is on and showing networks but i can not get on whthout being puled in to the router
pulled by the router? how do you mean?
what's your laptop make and model?
what ubuntu version are you running?
go to system > administration > additional hardware drivers, .. do you see an entry for your wireless card?
i can not it will not let me
are you connected using cable? if not, connect
yes i am it is the only way i can
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install bcmwl-kernel-source
if a package manager is running, close it, if an update is in progress, leave it till it finishes
